评论概述: Fits great, looks great, just great!
评论详情: Absolutely love this dress. Bought it for Halloween but definitely going to be wearing more than just once. Super comfortable. Love the ribbons, they help form fit. Wasn't expecting the bottom layer to be completely see through but it definitely helped the dress stay down in the wind. It fits to size, and beautiful
I love the style and elegance of the dress. The underskirt tulle is a bit itchy but that’s nothing wearing a slip or bodysuit underneath wouldn’t fix. The lace and ribbons are so shiny and beautiful.

I think the tie for the back isn't as thick as in the picture and the bows, but it's still nice. The ribbons are sturdy. I got xxl and I feel like it's as much as a size xxxl. I usually wear xxl or xxl, so this fit me perfectly for plus size. This is US size. Once I tied the ribbons and fix the dress up a bit, it looked great. I'll wear a petticoat underneath it and that'll make it look even better. The material is sturdy and not cheap looking. I think it'll last.
